I thought you meant that Megatron had evaded Scyther's attack and 25
shots flew toward Prowl, but Scyther hadn't fired anything so I got
confused.

::Scyther/Prowl::

Scyther was hit by 25 shots and thrown backwards, trying to stabolize
in the air.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl watches Megatron fly down to Arkness Prime, and also lowers
altitude, though he didn't know if IR would want him involved or not.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Yan, you didnt post that Scyther avoided the 25 shots Megatron
did?
> 
> 
> Megatron just moved out of the way of Prowls lashing, but what he
looked
> down to see suprised him. This wasnt eh Iron Raptor he had seen over
the
> video screen, and he knew the Matrix was at work. How many times
must it
> meddle in their affairs, he then had a look of shock on his face as
the
> lightning closed around him, and shrunk into him. He quickly fired a
> blast of his raw fusion energy downwards, and the crossfire hit,
> emmiting a large light of energy as the two forces met. Then it
cleared,
> and Megatron was left floating there, covering his face, smoke
lifting
> off of his body. 
> 
> As his arms moved away to reveal his face, it had a grimace on it of
> pure anger. He landed on the ground a few meters away from this new
> Prime. He pointed accusingly, "YOU, you are pathetic for challenging
me.
> Megatron DOES NOT YIELD TO KNOW ONE" he screamed, his rage apparent.
> "HOW DARE YOU. I AM OLDER THAN YOUR CREATOR, I AM MEGATRON. Do you
have
> any idea how many holders of the matrix I have crushed in my 20
million
> year life time? DO YOU" he screamed, furious at the audacity of this
> rookie Prime. "HOW DARE YOU"
